name: copycat
effect: Uses the last move that was used successfully by any Pokémon, including the user. This move cannot copy itself, nor roar nor whirlwind. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
short_effect: Uses the target’s last used move.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.
flavor_text.platinum: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.
